DOC.brief_title: Comparison Between FS- LASIK FS-SMILE Correction Myopia Myopic Astigmatism
DOC.detailed_description: Rationale Background LASIK ( laser situ keratomileusis ) surgical procedure design correct refractive error . LASIK involve create corneal flap use microkeratome follow reshape cornea use excimer laser remove tissue underlie stromal bed replace corneal flap . LASIK evolve variety technique refractive surgery . Keratomileusis , freeze non-freeze technique use USA 1970s.This procedure follow automated lamellar keratoplasty ( ALK ) , microkeratome use create either free cap hinge corneal flap . Tissue corneal bed remove alter refractive error flap replace . Keratomileusis ALK relatively imprecise mechanical technique . After ophthalmic excimer laser develop , use reshape cornea technique call photorefractive keratectomy ( PRK ) . LASIK combine technique create hinge corneal flap ALK excimer laser ablation PRK . Potential advantage LASIK PRK include earlier postoperative stabilization faster improvement visual acuity , less postoperative patient discomfort , short duration postoperative medication use easier enhancement procedure . However LASIK -like surgical procedures- without complication . Complications LASIK include dry eye , glare night vision complaint serious flap complication include button hole , free cap , incomplete flap , infection inflammation . Femtosecond laser widely use LASIK fashion corneal flap instead mechanical microkeratome , follow corneal ablation use excimer laser . The advantage femotosecond 'bladeless ' LASIK microkeratome LASIK flap precise flap thickness , reduce postoperative dry eye symptom , reduce flap dislocation reduce incidence buttonhole free cap . Recently , refractive lenticule extraction ( ReLEx ) introduce single laser refractive procedure ( all-in-one femtosecond LASIK ) without use excimer laser . Small incision lenticule extraction ( SMILE ) variation ReLEx require retractable flap reduce incidence flap complication , dry eye , reduce surgical time patient discomfort operate one device addition decrease risk ectasia . Patients method Type study Our study prospective , non-randomized , comparative clinical study apply patient myopia myopic astigmatism . Treatment group The study include 60 eye patient myopia myopic astigmatism present refractive correction . Femtosecond assist LASIK group include 30 eye SMILE group include 30 eye . Pre-operative examination All patient undergo complete ophthalmological examination surgery , include : - Uncorrected best correct visual acuity assessement use snellen visual acuity chart . - Manifest refraction . - Slit lamp examination . - IOP measurement . - Dilated fundus examination - Assessment dry eye use Schirmer test tear break time test ( TBUT ) . - Corneal topographic analysis use combine Schimpflug placido disc image principle use CSO topography system ( CSO , Firenze , Italy ) . - Wavefront analysis . - Corneal biomechanical parameter use Ocular Response Analyzer ( ORA ; Reichert Inc , Depew , NY ) . Surgical procedure LASIK procedure Each LASIK procedure perform use standard , establish technique . Under topical anesthesia standard draping , lid speculum use retract eyelid . A superiorly hinge 100 μm thick flap create use WaveLight FS200 ( Alcon Laboratories , Inc. ) With invert side cut ( 115 ̊ ) .Excimer laser ablation perform use WaveLight EX500 excimer laser ( Alcon Laboratories , Inc. ) .After ablation , flap carefully reposition , postoperative medication commence . SMILE procedure Each SMILE procedure perform use establish , describe technique . After application topical anesthesia , standard sterile draping , insertion speculum , patient 's eye center docked curved interface cone application suction fixation . The laser activate photo-dissection follow sequence : first posterior surface refractive lenticule ( spiral ) , lenticule border create . The anterior surface refractive lenticule ( spiral ) form extend beyond posterior lenticule diameter 0.5 mm form anterior flap follow rim cut . After suction release , Siebel spatula ( Rhein Medical , Heidelberg , Germany ) insert cap near hinge cap separate . The edge refractive lenticule separate stromal bed sinsky hook posterior border lenticule gently separate Siebel spatula . The lenticule grasp non-toothed serrated forceps small incision . Postoperative management Postoperative treatment : - Topical tobramycin dexamethasone eye drop ( Tobradex ; Alcon Laboratories , Inc. , Fort Worth , TX ) use postoperatively every 6 hour 1 week stop . - Topical lubricant also prescribe applied every 6 hour 1 month ( refresh liquigel , Allergan Laboratories , Inc. ) . Postoperative assessment : • Postoperative visit schedule first postoperative day , 1 month 3 month surgery . On first postoperative day , UCVA measurement slit-lamp examination ( flap position corneal integrity ) perform . Three month surgery , clinical examination preoperatively perform . Statistical analysis Data present term parametric non-parametric data . Parametric data analyze paired student test . Non-parametric data analyze Wilcoxon test . Statistical significance consider 95 % confidence interval . All test two tail consider significant p < 0.05 highly significant p < 0.01 .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 18 year old . 2 . Best correct visual acuity 6/6 . 3 . Manifest refraction spherical equivalent ( MRSE ) 9diopters ( D ) . 4 . Refractive cylinder 3 diopter ( D ) . 5 . No topographic evidence forme frust keratoconus ( FFKC ) . 6 . No progressive change sphere cylinder 0.5 diopter per year . 1 . Previous history ocular trauma ocular surgery . 2 . Concomitant active previous ocular disease uveitis glaucoma . 3 . Systemic disease affect wound heal diabetes mellitus , collagen vascular diseases 4 . Dry eye .
